title: 3 bath with a guest house in the mountains
posting_body: ['Freshly remodeled, beautiful split-level mountain home.', 'New everything: bathrooms, granite kitchen island, decks.', "The detached, 2.5 car garage has a sunny, 900 square foot guest house, with it's own deck, upstairs.", 'Heat and A/C on both levels.', 'Three private acres, set in a natural forest surrounded by trees and rock outcroppings.', "Mule deer, elk, and bears are common up here yet, it's only 35 minutes to Denver.", 'Two wrap-around decks are great for enjoying nature, and sitting under the stars is amazing.', 'Open concept main floor features a mud/gear room, brand new appliances in kitchen/dining, granite top kitchen island and a wood burning fireplace.', 'Upstairs, the master bedroom has hardwood floors and a full bath.', 'There are also two additional bedrooms and another full bathroom with a new tub.', 'Walk out on to the upper deck for a great view of Mt Evans.', 'The lower level features a fourth bedroom/workspace, another living room, a second fireplace and a combo bathroom/utility room with washer and dryer hookups.', 'From the downstairs living room, you can walk out onto the deck by the Jacuzzi.', 'There is an apartment is across the driveway from the main house with its own private entrance, deck, kitchen, bath and carport for guests or family, and can be included for an additional $500/mo.', 'Note: At this time, the main house can be rented separately from the loft/guest house.', '***Covered horse stall on the property.', 'Up to two horses welcome.', ' Put up a flex fence for a corral.', 'Well-behaved indoor pets are welcome.', 'NOTE:', 'Many upgrades being done in July and early August.', 'Pictures in the ad are from before the remodel was done.', 'Email to get rental application and set up a time to see the house.', '$3900.00/Month', '$3900.00/Deposit']
